name: Sweet Spicy Wings
author: Lisa I.
summary: Sweet and spicy wings! You can make two batches of the sauce, use one as a marinade before grilling the chicken, and pour the second batch over the chicken after it is grilled. It is not mandatory to do it this way, just better!
ingredients: 6 pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded
1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat
Grill the chicken 8 to 12 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear
(You can deep fry or bake the chicken instead if you want to, but it is best when grilled
) Remove chicken to a large roasting pan
In a saucepan over medium heat, mix the hot sauce, butter, honey, garlic salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper
Simmer about 10 minutes, until blended and heated through
Pour the sauce over the grilled chicken wings and stir to coat
